remarks: A topological space depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
statement:
tpsprop2d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
tpsprop2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopSet ` K ) = ( TopSet ` L ) ) $.
tpsprop2d $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. TopSp <-> L e. TopSp ) ) $.
